# title

**Instance Property**

A title that names the tip.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: Text { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to convey the benefit of your tip. All tips require a title.

## Setting tip content

- **message**: A short description of how to use the tip’s feature.
- **image**: The image associated with the tip.
- **id**: The tip’s unique identifier.

items.description: A short description of how to use the tip’s feature.
items.name: message

items.description: The image associated with the tip.
